title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 72 - Cigarette Wholesale Dealer's License
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 72 - Cigarette Wholesale Dealer's License

State Regulations
§ 72.1 - Licensing of wholesale dealers of cigarettes
§ 72.2 - Refusal to license
§ 72.3 - Cancellation or suspension of a license as a wholesale dealer of cigarettes
§ 72.4 - Notification of cancellation, suspension or refusal to license

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 72

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 475, 482-a, 488; art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
